description: Erection of side access gate with pitched roof
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.
Please pay the Pre-Application fee of Â£145. This can be paid either online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Service Team on 020 8547 5002

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Acceptable minor works to reduce and maintain trees at their current size in relation to the property with no adverse impact upon tree health or public amnity.Recommendation:No objections.
